documents.document: When we recognize the goodness and power of our basic inner nature, we are lifted, restored by the inner harmony.
Our Healing Center dog says, "bark less, wag more." RT @RootsCenter
People often ask me, how do I develop an above-average income? The answer is, become an above-average person. ~ Jim Rohn
Feel the power within, the power to do, the creative power to be; to express who you are.
I love when there's denial about missing Oreos...but there's evidence still on the face... #redhanded RT @josiespeaks
First, I'm trying to prove to myself that I'm a person. Then maybe I'll convince myself that I'm an actress. ~ Marilyn Monroe
Bye, honey. You run errands while the kids nap & I'll do some housework. Opens beer, checks Twitter so you know I'm one of you RT @DaddyNick
There is not enough darkness in all the world to put out the light of even one small candle. ~ Robert Alden
My wife's ok with this twitter account. I don't know if I should be happy or very very worried. RT @100percent001
Love life and life will love you back. Love people and they will love you back. ~ Arthur Rubinstein
True learning is not just about absorbing information. It is also having the willingness to see.
I just introduced the GIRL I used to be to the LADY I am and she can't wait to meet the WOMAN I've become. RT @iVictoriousVee
No man can tell whether he's rich or poor by turning to his ledger. It's the heart that makes a man rich. ~ Henry Ward Beecher
Don't join a hate group espousing a noble cause. Join those who rally others to kindness, appreciation or compassion.
When children see their joy reflected in our faces it helps them connect with that joy and us more. RT @OffBeatFamily
She behaves as if she was beautiful. Most American women do. It is the secret of their charm. ~ Oscar Wilde
When we focus our intent, not to do battle but to live with passion and purpose, the universe hears our call and reveals the way.
I dream of a better world ... A world where a chicken can cross the road without his motives being questioned. RT @amyguthrierox
Those who don't believe in magic will never find it. ~ Roald Dahl
Shift negative thoughts with those which see beyond the gloom, and your feelings will respond to the sunnier view.
Sometimes those who need it the most are inclined the least. RT @CharisCharis1
If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine. ~ Morris West
Being One with yourself is being One with all things. RT @Corey_J_Jones
I let them think what they want. If they care enough to bother with what I do, then I'm already better than them. ~ Marilyn Monroe
Meditation is enacting the feminine principle of allowing instead of doing. By meditating, you create. RT @DrJenniferBrown
The breeze at dawn has secrets to tell you. Don't go back to sleep. ~ Rumi
When you have a mindset for abundance you start to see opportunity everywhere! RT @theLifeyouDream
Faith makes all things possible. Hope makes all things work. Love makes all things beautiful. ~ Anon.
We judge ourselves by what we feel we're capable of doing, while others judge us by what we have already done. RT @Akon
Kind hearts are the gardens / Kind thoughts are the roots / Kind words are the blossoms / Kind deeds are the fruits. ~ Henry W Longfellow
When we establish a good connection with our own inner guidance, we are stronger and the opinions of others are of less concern.
From a student essay: "Sir Francis Drake circumcised the world with a 100 foot clipper." ~ Anon | Ouch!
Music is the expression of harmony in sound. Love is the expression of harmony in life. ~ Stephen F. Gaskin
Those who bug you, bother you and belittle you are there to remind you of your true path. Return to it with respect; release the enmity.
The real trouble with reality is that there's no background music. RT @ThatFancyLady
Like a lotus flower with its head above the muddy pool, live in the world and yet be out of it. ~ Kirpal Singh
Choose Who you wish to be today. Think it. Feel it. Take aligned actions to it. Then watch life elegantly deliver it. ~ RT @krisraphael
Love is a great beautifier. ~ Louisa May Alcott
The feelings we express affect what we will receive. Repaying hostility with empathy is more fruitful than repaying in kind.
Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died. RT @gfsocial
Behavior is the mirror in which everyone shows their image. ~ Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
When the ideas we hold conflict with the inner power we feel, the result is confusion, stress and a sense of being disempowered.
To quote from the film 'The Help' : "I is kind, I is smart, I is important" I is, all this and MORE! RT @LourdesAnne1
Just when I was getting used to yesterday, along came today. RT @sshalika
The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire. ~ Ferdinand Foch
The people, situations, and events of our lives resonate with our feelings. Find inner harmony and our world will also respond.
When we let go of our need to control, life unfolds beautifully as it should. The art of perfect timing. RT @ShokiMokgapa
You broke my old shells & left me naked & pure with a light so bright that I can't perceive the world as I did before... RT @ElenaRockinger
Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either. ~ Albert Einstein
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today. ~ Abraham Lincoln
Fiction is democratic, it reasserts the authority of the single mind to make and remake the world. ~ E. L. Doctorow
The "kingdom of Heaven" is a condition of the heart - not something that comes "upon the earth" or "after death." ~ Friedrich Nietzsche
When in touch with our inner harmony, we don't need to control others to feel a sense of power. Our feelings guide and empower us.
The silence I see, the colour I hear, the music I feel makes every breath worthwhile... light up butterfly. @arabellelacroix
No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings. ~ William Blake
Inner power can be used destructively - the dark side of who we are - or released to create beauty and joy. We get to choose.
Friendship isn't a big thing - it's a million little things. RT @karolinute1997
What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family. ~ Mother Teresa
Forgiveness doesn't require a good reason when you understand that there is nothing to forgive, for we are creators of our own reality.
“If you think this Universe is bad, you should see some of the others.” ~ Philip K. Dick
I know I'm getting old. I was watching some porn the other day and I thought to myself...Wow, that's a nice bed... RT @MartyFLawrence1
Within us lies the power to be the meanest or the noblest. Life offers the chance to choose from the best of who we are.
There is no power that could extinguish the eternal flame burning within each one of you! RT DoreenVirtue444
Man only likes to count his troubles; he doesn't calculate his happiness. ~ Fyodor Dostoevsky
Happiness is your natural state. Unhappiness means you have allowed yourself to be distracted.
I may not have gone where I wanted to go, but I think I have ended up where I needed to be. RT @Ariannexo
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself. ~ Rumi
When you are reflective and feeling stress, check whether inaction has frustrated your desires; whether you should be tending to your goals.
I don't mind coexisting with the paranormal as long as they don't watch me shower. RT @CandaceGardner7
Until you make peace with who you are you'll never be content with what you have. ~ Doris Mortman
When you are goal-directed but stressed it may be time to let go and trust yourself more; time to get out of your own way.
I can't trust you if you treat me like an option while I continue to treat you like a priority. RT @antiSerphres
Just read an article on the effects of heavy drinking so that's it, I'm done...after today no more reading! ~ Ellen Degeneres
I know my children are healthy, sleeping peacefully and that my whole family are all together and well. RT @OurTownMagazine
The two most important days in your life are the day you were born and the day you find out why. ~ Mark Twain
Creating a better future starts in the present by looking beyond the grim possibilities and appreciating the many wonders of life today.
I've been told I'm like an onion; I have many layers... oh, and I make people cry. RT @RunCarlaRun
Happiness is not a state to arrive at, but a manner of traveling. ~ Margaret Lee Runbeck
I'd rather be creating heaven on earth than on earth thinking about heaven. RT @TheRevMichael
Letting you go is hard because it's like letting go of part of myself. ~ Anon.
When you change, it takes time for others to realize that the change is enduring and to respond to the new expression of who you are.
Was given the book, '50 Shades of Grey' today - unfortunately it didn't come with a boyfriend! RT @powerofcolour
To learn to dance by practicing dancing or to learn to live by practicing living, the principles are the same. ~ Martha Graham
Love is the only thing you take with you! ~ RT @MinuteMindset
A kiss without a hug is like a flower without the fragrance. ~ Proverb
Whatever happens is as it should be, so allow it. Whatever comes depicts your beliefs about you and the world at large; of what you think.
You can go outside and chase happiness or go inside and let it come to you. RT @InspiredInLife
Being in therapy is great. I spend an hour just talking about myself. It's kinda like being the guy on a date. ~ Caroline Rhea
The inner You, all possible "yous", contains the meanest and the noblest. Life offers the chance to choose the best of who you are.
The Ephron Effect is this: By being true to yourself, and by being open to change, you will be an inspiration. RT @neerja2009
Today was the perfect day. (So was yesterday. Same tomorrow.) RT @JoanGregerson
Well behaved women seldom make history. ~ Eleanor Roosevelt
Trusting that things will turn out well replaces fear with opportunity.
Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands and then eat just one of the pieces. ~ J. Viorst
When the determination to do well is felt as stress rather than enthusiasm, trust yourself more and push yourself less.
It isn't until you come to a spiritual understanding of who you are that you can begin to take control. RT @myevolvedlife
You never know what life is like until you have lived it. ~ Marilyn Monroe
Trust that you will handle the rough seas and keep choosing the best options you see - you'll soon reach calmer waters.
Every blessed day of this life is a gift! There is always something to celebrate! RT @RochelleForrest
My soul preached to me and said, 'Do not be delighted because of praise, and do not be distressed because of blame.' ~ Kahlil Gibran
